name: Anselmo
description:
This is my first project in Unreal Engine 5 :)

You are in the shoes of Anselmo, a boy who lives in a floating island and wants to get to a portal. Try not to fall into the clouds while jumping, dashing, and picking up coins!

Controls:

TypeKeyboardGamepadMovementW, A, S, DLeft stickCameraMouseRight stickJumpSpace barSouth buttonDash (when unlocked)Space bar while in the airSouth button while in the air
